actions.description: The maw makes two Bite or Fang Fling attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d12 + 6) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 10 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d10 + 6) piercing damage.
actions.name: Fang Fling

actions.description: The maw moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks and can move through the spaces of Large or smaller creatures. Each time the maw enters a creature's space for the first time during this move, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or take 25 (3d12 + 6) piercing damage and have the grappled condition (escape DC 16); if a creature is already grappled this way, it has the prone condition. Until this grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition. The maw can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.
actions.name: Gorging Charge (Recharge 5-6)

specialTraits.description: The maw has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance
